alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Iron and southern Ashland Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Glidden, or 17 miles northwest of Park Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glidden around 500 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mellen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
